claim:
Methods
We conducted this systematic literature review (SLR) for articles that were published until July 2024, using the PRISMA method to select articles (Figure 7).
title: Figure 7.
caption: PRISMA flowchart.

claim: Digital skills are antecedents for employability (Lissitsa and Chachashvili-Bolotin, 2019), although there are few quantitative studies assessing the relationship between DL and employability, particularly in conceptual models (see Figure 8).
title: Figure 8.
caption: The conceptual relationship among digital literacy, employability, and innovative work behavior.

claim: In 33 articles on DL and employability, we found 192 keywords, 6 thresholds, and 2 clusters (Figure 5).
title: Figure 5.
caption: Co-occurrence network visualization of digital literacy and employability.

claim: From 435 articles on DL and IWB, we found 2,107 keywords, 123 thresholds, and 6 clusters (Figure 6).
title: Figure 6.
caption: Co-occurrence network visualization of digital literacy and innovative work behavior.
